title: Easter devilled eggs
ingredients: ['12 large eggs', '4 tablespoons mayonnaise or creamy salad dressing', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'hot chilli sauce, to taste', '1/4 teaspoon dry mustard', '4 drops red food colouring, or as needed', '4 drops blue food colouring, or as needed', '4 drops green food colouring, or as needed', 'cold water as needed']
